cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 5776, Serving Our LGBTQ Veterans Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 190 (Thursday, October 28, 2021)]
[House]
[Pages H6034-H6035]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. KAHELE:
H.R. 5776.
[[Page H6035]]
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I of the Constitution

latestAction.text: Ordered to be Reported by the Yeas and Nays: 19 - 11.

title: Serving Our LGBTQ Veterans Act
